___keyword.description: Matches a keyword within the body of a Tweet.

___time_zone.description: Matches Tweets where the user-selected time zone specified in a user’s profile settings matches a given string.

___retweets_of.description: Matches Retweets that are Tweets of a specified user (name or ID).

___has_links.description: This operator matches Tweets which contain links in the message body.

___bounding_box.description: Matches against the Exact Location (x,y) of the Tweet when present, and in Twitter, against a “Place” geo polygon.

___has_images.description: A boolean search operator that returns all Tweets that contain a native images (e.g. pic.twitter.com).

___has_media.description: Matches Tweets that contain a media url classified by Twitter, e.g. pic.twitter.com.

___has_mentions.description: Matches Tweets that mention another Twitter user.

___hashtag.description: Matches any Tweet with the given hashtag.

___point_radius.description: Matches against the Exact Location (x,y) of the Tweet when present, and in Twitter, against a “Place” geo polygon, where the Place is fully contained within the defined region.

___place_country.description: Matches Tweets tagged with the specified location or Twitter place ID (see examples). Multi-word place names (“New York City”, “Palo Alto”) should be enclosed in quotes.

___bio.description: Matches a keyword or phrase within the user bio of a Tweet.

___has_videos.description: A boolean search operator that returns all Tweets that contain native videos (does not include vine, periscope).

___exact_phrase.description: Matches an exact phrase within the body of a Tweet.

___place.description: Matches Tweets tagged with a specified location or 'Twitter place.

___mention.description: Matches any Tweet that mentions the given user (name or ID).

___lang.description: Matches Tweets that have been classified by Twitter as being of a particular language. Assigned to one of over 50 languages or marked as 'undefined.'

___url.description: Performs a tokenized (keyword/phrase) match on the expanded URLs of a Tweet.

___emoji.description: Matches an emoji within the body of a Tweet.

___to.description: Matches any Tweet that is in reply to a particular user.

___from.description: Matches any Tweet from a specific user (name or ID).

___bio_location.description: Matches Tweets where the user’s bio-level location contains the specified keyword or phrase.

___bio_name.description: Matches a keyword within the user bio name of a Tweet.
